# Fort (Building)
## Overview
**Fort**

**Create** 136 Goods, 25 Influence, 124 Labor, 1 Magic (6,050 gp)

**Rooms** 2 Armories, 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 2 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 1 [[Cell (Room)|Cell]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 3 [[Defensive Wall (Room)|Defensive Walls]], 1 [[Dojo (Room)|Dojo]], 2 Fortifications (in the [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]] and [[Gatehouse]]), 1 [[Gatehouse (Room)|Gatehouse]], 1 [[Infirmary (Room)|Infirmary]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[War Room (Room)|War Room]]

A fortified outpost for bandits, mercenaries, soldiers, or dangerous humanoids.
